query.name: getMeta
query.sql: select 'user_code' name,'用户编号' prompt,100 width from dual union select 'user_name' name,'用户名' prompt,100 width from dual union select 'status' name,'状态' prompt,100 width from dual union select 'create_date' name,'创建日期' prompt,100 width from dual union select 'last_update_date' name,'最后修改日期' prompt,100 width from dual union select 'last_update_user' name,'最后经手人' prompt,100 width from dual

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.role_id, u.user_code, u.status, DATE_FORMAT(u.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(u.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =u.last_update_by) last_update_user, u.create_date date, u.password FROM SYS_USER u #WHERE_CLAUSE# order by u.user_code
